translation: Never speak this to one who is devoid of austerities or devotion, who does not render service, who does not desire to listen, or who cavils at Me.
commentary: 18.67 This this? They by thee? Not not? atapaskaya to one who is devoid of austerity? Not not? Abhaktaya to one who is not devoted? Never never? Not not? f and? Ashushrushave to one who does not render service or who does not desire to listen? Vachyam to be spoken? Not not? f and? Maam Me? who who?
